comments: Coordination sequence for 16-dimensional cyclotomic lattice Z[zeta_32].
references: J. Serra-Sagrista, Enumeration of lattice points in l_1 norm, Information Processing Letters, 76, no. 1-2 (2000), 39-44.
links: M. Beck and S. Hosten, Cyclotomic polytopes and growth series of cyclotomic lattices, arXiv math.CO/0508136
J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, Low-Dimensional Lattices VII: Coordination Sequences, Proc. Royal Soc. London, A453 (1997), 2369-2389 (Abstract, pdf, ps).
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (16, -120, 560, -1820, 4368, -8008, 11440, -12870, 11440, -8008, 4368, -1820, 560, -120, 16, -1).
author: Serra-Sagrista, Joan; jserra(AT)ccd.uab.es
extensions: Recomputed Nov 25 1998 by _N. J. A. Sloane_.
Formula clarified by _Harvey P. Dale_, Dec 27 2015
